org.csdgn.maru

Class ByteConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.csdgn.maru.ByteConverter

  • public class ByteConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    I am tired of rewriting all these methods when I need them. Why use a complicated ByteBuffer when you can get exactly what you want with this ByteConverter? All those who work with binary files may appreciate this class.
    Author:
    Robert Maupin
